summary: AN ORDINANCE transferring the rights and permission granted to the Arcade Building and Realty Company, by Ordinance 51850, as amended by Ordinance 93147 to construct, maintain and use a tunnel or subway under and across First Avenue between Union and University Streets, to Arcade Development Company; amending Sections 9-B and 9-C of said ordinance to conform to present City of Seattle requirements; adding new Section 10 specifying the term of the permit; and providing for acceptance of the permit and conditions.
